alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Lexington; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Fairfield, northeastern Lexington and northwestern Richland Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 900 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fairfield County Airport, or 8 miles south of Winnsboro, moving southwest at 30 mph. ...Boaters on Lake Murray Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbia, Lexington, West Columbia, Cayce, Irmo, Springdale, Oak Grove, St. Andrews, Highway 6 at Lake Murray Dam, Red Bank, Pine Ridge, Riverbanks Zoo, Columbia Metro Airport, Ballentine, Columbia International University, Harbison State Forest, Blythewood, Seven Oaks, Lighthouse Marina and Lake Murray Marina. This includes the following highways... Interstate 126 between mile markers 0 and 3. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 56 and 68. Interstate 26 between mile markers 95 and 115. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
